TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class Field : Java.Lang.Reflect.AccessibleObject, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, Java.Lang.Reflect.IMember

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Field extends Java.Lang.Reflect.AccessibleObject implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class Java.Lang.Reflect.IMember, class System.IDisposable
type Field = class inherit AccessibleObject interface IMember interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IJavaPeerable

Docs.summary: A Field provides information about, and dynamic access to, a single field of a class or an interface.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the Class object representing the class or interface that declares the field represented by this Field object.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns a Type object that represents the declared type for the field represented by this Field object.
Docs.value: a Type object that represents the declared type for the field represented by this Field object

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the generic field signature is invalid
if the generic type points to a missing type
if the generic type points to a type that cannot be instantiated for some reason

Docs.summary: Returns the value of the field represented by this Field, on the specified object.
